i18n.title: i18n Example
i18n.content: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy [...] is a comedy science fiction franchise created by Douglas Adams. Originally a 1978 radio comedy broadcast on BBC Radio 4, it was later adapted to other formats, including novels, stage shows, comic books, a 1981 TV series, a 1984 text-based computer game, and 2005 feature film.

about: This is the about page contained in the file /views/AboutViews.vue
